bug.author: shashwatwork
bug.summary: TypeError: write() argument 1 must be unicode, not str
bug.description:
Hi, I'm using python 2.7 and I got error like TypeError: write() argument 1 must be unicode, not str while trying to install pandas profiling using pip. I have also tried to install from source code. again same error getting. Please help me to install this on top of python 2.7. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22785727/61039304-1f0bff00-a3ec-11e9-92d2-01c4254f7ff2.PNG></denchmark-link>
Thanks in Advance

comments.comment: You need python 3 to run pandas_profiling. If you are interested why, please read <denchmark-link:https://python3statement.org/>https://python3statement.org/</denchmark-link> . (note that if for some reason you are restricted to python 2, you could use the previous version via pip install pandas-profiling==1.4.1. This version misses many features though).
